lines: gzhan don rjes su dpag pa ni
rang gis mthong don rab gsal byed
ces pa'i don 'chad pa la gsum
rang gis mthong ba smos pa'i dgos pa
brjod rung grags pa yin par bstan
brjod rung gnod byed yin par bstan
brjod rung grags par slob dpon bzhed
mdo'i tshig gi dgongs ba bshad
khyod mngon sum gyis grub pa'i phyir
sgra'i ngo bo de nyid chos can
khyod la don zhes bshad de
don dam par grub pa'i phyir
bsgrub bya ston pa zhes 'di la
grub pa med la don byas nyid
de lta na na rtags dang dpe
ma grub brjod pa thal bar 'gyur
zhes pa'i don 'chad pa la
rigs pa can pa na re
gang phyir gtan chigs dag dang ni
der snang phal cher phyogs chos nyid
des na gtan tshigs sogs don gyi
sngon du de dbye bstan par bya
zhes sogs kyi don 'chad pa la
gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid mi 'chad par
ci'i phyir dbye ba 'chad ce na
bstan pa rin chen yun ring gsal ba dang
rang nyid goms dang gzhan la phan bya'i phyir
tshig nyung don gsal snga phyi 'brel chags pa'i
rnam bshad 'di ni dge 'dun grub kyis byas
dge ba 'di yis tshe rabs thams cad du
rgyal ba rnams kyi chos rnams ma lus pa
rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ji bzhin 'dzin pa la
rje btsun mkhyen pa'i gter dang mtshungs par shog
'gro la brtse ba'i gter chen spyan ras gzigs
slar yang dur smrig zlos gar tshul bzungs nas
bsil ldan yongs la phan bde stsol mdzad pa
smra ba'i nyi ma dge 'dun grub la 'dud
dngos stobs rigs pa'i gzhung lugs gnam lcags kyis
mu stegs pan pa'i brag ri byer brlag nas
rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ma nor gsal mdzad pa'i
rnam 'grel dgongs don rnam par bshad ba 'di
bkra shis dge mtshan spungs pa'i lhun po'i sbor
chos sbyin rgya cher spel phyir pang du bsgrubs
dge nges rigs lam dri med legs bshad 'di
phyogs dus kun tu ngar zhing rgyas gyur cig
'di yi ched du 'bad pa du ma yis
brtson pa bgyid pa'i skye dgu du ma rnams
gnas skabs su yang tshe ring nad med cing
mthar thug rnam 'dren go 'phang myur thob shog
khyad par bla ma mkha' 'gros lung bstan pa'i
bka' gdams chos kyi 'byung gnas chos grwa che'i
'phrin las 'od brgya phyogs bcur 'phro ba dang
bstan 'dzin rnams kyang srid mthar zhabs brtan shog
